mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_nicknames ( session_id, device_token, nickname, color_code, created_at ) VALUES ( #{sessionId}, #{deviceToken}, #{nickname}, #{colorCode}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE customer_nicknames SET nickname = #{nickname}, color_code = #{colorCode}, created_at = NOW() WHERE session_id = #{sessionId} AND device_token = #{deviceToken}
mapper.select: SELECT color_code FROM customer_nicknames WHERE session_id = #{sessionId}
